content.question: In the absence of externalities, the perfectly competitive market maximizes economic surplus when

choices.label: the market price is above the equilibrium price
the market price is below the equilibrium price
for the last unit produced, marginal benefit exceeds marginal cost
the total benefit from all units produced equals the total costs of all units produced
